parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> 2.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Briefing

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Variables

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> A non-existent [[Diary Record]]. To compare non-existent objects use [[isNull]] or [[isEqualTo]]:
* <tt>[[diaryRecordNull]] <template><title>=</title></template><template><title>=</title></template> [[diaryRecordNull]]; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>false</value></part></template></tt>
* <tt>[[isNull]] [[diaryRecordNull]]; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>true</value></part></template></tt>
* <tt>[[diaryRecordNull]] [[isEqualTo]] [[diaryRecordNull]]; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>true</value></part></template></tt>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[diaryRecordNull]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Diary Record]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[isNull]] [[diaryRecordNull]]; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>true</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[isNull]] ([[objNull]] [[createDiaryRecord]] ["Diary", ["Title", "Text"]]); <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>true - [[objNull]] cannot take diary records</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> <code>[[str]] [[diaryRecordNull]]; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>"No diary record"</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>x4</name>=<value> <code>[[private]] _diaryRecord = [[diaryRecordNull]];
[[if]] ([[damage]] [[player]] > 0.5) [[then]]
{
	_diaryRecord = [[player]] [[createDiaryRecord]] ["Diary", ["Heal yourself", "Ask a medic"]];
};
[[if]] ([[not]] [[isNull]] _diaryRecord) [[then]] { [[hint]] "Diary record added."; };</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[objNull]], [[controlNull]], [[displayNull]], [[grpNull]], [[locationNull]], [[taskNull]], [[teamMemberNull]], [[scriptNull]], [[configNull]], [[typeName]], [[isNull]]
</value></part></template></root>
